text:
[wearables-report/] 6 new commits:
[wearables-report/] <https://bitbucket.org/uncorkedstudios/wearables-report/commits/26b82a7f02101716d0ec31cee958fc3dee250394|26b82a7f0210>: Optimized images.
 - gastonfig
[wearables-report/] <https://bitbucket.org/uncorkedstudios/wearables-report/commits/e6baf31f459600d089f564928bccdb076eecf70e|e6baf31f4596>: Small mobile nav adjustments.
 - gastonfig
[wearables-report/] <https://bitbucket.org/uncorkedstudios/wearables-report/commits/bafb69eec8ea0d25ec5669e01043afb00152641a|bafb69eec8ea>: Going back to bigger ask images for smaller devices.
 - gastonfig
[wearables-report/] <https://bitbucket.org/uncorkedstudios/wearables-report/commits/baad99e9750badd05cb42496b1053a61925753bd|baad99e9750b>: Allowing mobile users to scale the layout.
 - gastonfig
[wearables-report/] <https://bitbucket.org/uncorkedstudios/wearables-report/commits/6916ceb1256661bec18629c4ad33d99b71aed1aa|6916ceb12566>: Added analytics code.
 - gastonfig
[wearables-report/] <https://bitbucket.org/uncorkedstudios/wearables-report/commits/a7f3fa9e9a3a81140293eaf14efd8f75d21d9791|a7f3fa9e9a3a>: Correct top and bottom UL margins.
 - gastonfig
<@U026E0ZNR> did we get rid of the device image gallery?
oh wait there’s just no controls for it…
i will add a trello card for gaston about click-to-advance on all galleries
I need to properly export them too. Sizes are different from what I gave in my PSD file.
cool
hey how do you feel about using that gold color for text links?
Yeah, gold feels good for links. Turquoise for callout/highlight stuff.
sweet. i’ll let gaston know
<@U0260V1BX>: Do we have a type style for captions on charts or should I make a new one?
i didn’t make one… although i saw one on staging
Staging?
<http://staging.uncorkedstudios.com/ucs-wearables/page-3.html>
bottom of the page
Oh yeah,  we can use that but I wanted to make sure we didn’t have any conflict in style for these.
We still need to put captions on the other charts.
no i didn’t make a style- go for it
Cool.

[wearables-report/] 3 new commits:
[wearables-report/] <https://bitbucket.org/uncorkedstudios/wearables-report/commits/568418a9ac49c5e049869219b7dbdaf8291b268a|568418a9ac49>: Added site description
 - gastonfig
[wearables-report/] <https://bitbucket.org/uncorkedstudios/wearables-report/commits/c015202fc4c9fb6171e7528af68567a64a11a873|c015202fc4c9>: Updated link colors and fixed link on page 5
 - gastonfig
[wearables-report/] <https://bitbucket.org/uncorkedstudios/wearables-report/commits/e00979dcfe9cabee3294a3d64facaa80965adca8|e00979dcfe9c>: Updated device photos.

Signed-off-by: Gaston Figueroa <gastonfig@gmail.com>
 - gastonfig
We don’t have the subtitle anywhere on the article: Wearables In Review
nice catch
I’m working on a solve.

[wearables-report/] 2 new commits:
[wearables-report/] <https://bitbucket.org/uncorkedstudios/wearables-report/commits/908ad23bdcd8b744f41c2ad2ac574f716df75971|908ad23bdcd8>: Fixed typo.
 - gastonfig
[wearables-report/] <https://bitbucket.org/uncorkedstudios/wearables-report/commits/b5c7d234be240c6373c5237bb61bd66984cc8ed7|b5c7d234be24>: Bolding item on p.3.
 - gastonfig

Abby Yeakel commented on a card: <https://trello.com/card/533352be87284bb42ccd63e3/5339b9c235a2a3212cdcbce5|Swap the two gold charts for proper placement. (will need to reexport "Unguided vs. Competition" chart w/o caption – my bad)>
@trentedwards1  can you re export and make sure Gaston has the corrected chart?

Abby Yeakel commented on a card: <https://trello.com/card/533352be87284bb42ccd63e3/53389cbff04028c4452fbc24|Code charts>
think we should scrap this for time's sake

Melissa Chan commented on a card: <https://trello.com/card/533352be87284bb42ccd63e3/53389cbff04028c4452fbc24|Code charts>
@abbyyeakel  should we make a separate Dev Post-Launch list?

Abby Yeakel commented on a card: <https://trello.com/card/533352be87284bb42ccd63e3/53389cbff04028c4452fbc24|Code charts>
@melissachan2 yes I was thinking the same. I'm on it.
Abby Yeakel created a list: <https://trello.com/board/533352be87284bb42ccd63e3|Post Launch Additions>
Abby Yeakel created a card: <https://trello.com/card/533352be87284bb42ccd63e3/5339d4a53780b06806209b9b|Add videos to section headers>

Abby Yeakel commented on a card: <https://trello.com/card/533352be87284bb42ccd63e3/5333531da6123d735283a5ff|edit and export photos>
@trentedwards1 is this still something that needs to be done?
hey <@U026E0ZNR> how’s the “Wearables in Review” coming?
Gaston has the PSD with all he needs for that, and the Appendix footer stuff too.
ah ok. i’m just tracking stuff in Trello- is it in there?
The PSD was large so I just emailed it, I put a screen shot of it in Trello.
not seeing it
just curious to see how it looks :)
can we also clarify for Gaston which design for the footer/appendix that we're going with? Looks like we have three options in one trello card currently
sure. <@U026E0ZNR> i take it you prefer the social links on the white bg?
I just recreated exactly what we have on our current blog posts but with updated hover state colors.
i saw that, but i had already sent gaston designs
i thought thats how we divided up this morning
i wasnt sure if you were designing in reaction to mine or if you just didn’t see that i’d already posted
I made that before lunch but didn’t send it till after. I sent the option because of my same concern about too much over the photos (Next Section example).
We can leave them over the photos but I didn’t want too much obscuring the photography we have.
ok. sorry for the confusion, i just didn’t realize we were both designing it. I honestly don’t have a super strong opinion either way. I’ll clarify the direction on trello.
awesome thanks guys
trello list looks good. i'll link up with Gaston between tonight and tomorrow morning and we'll keep pushing the ball forward. I'll update everyone accordingly and we can put a launch plan in place.
